text: monitor is the
fourth biggest bank on czech market we
have been the first bank to go to cloud
and we are focusing on innovation and
digital products
and we aim to be champions for retail
and small and medium enterprise
financing
monitors market capitalization stands at
around 40 billion check crown currently
and we have over 1.3 million clients on
ship market
our vision is to be the most innovative
financial service company on czech
market
and we want to be recognized as such by
our employees but also by our customers
and by the community as a whole
monitor has quite long tradition dating
back to 1990s
and therefore we have been born on
premise but a couple of years back we
have decided
that going to cloud is our strategic
priority
we want to become less dependent on our
on-premise infrastructure
and make sure that we have to manage
less of the
complex infrastructure which we used to
have we are currently running about one
third of our infrastructure on aws
we are actually having over 450 ec2
instances
which is actually more than 60 increase
over last year
and interesting fact is that while we
have had such a large increase the cost
increased only by 12
initially we have been running primarily
the non-critical application
in the cloud but in a recent year we
have started to move
also our critical applications including
parts of our payment solution
also our integration platform to the
cloud with aws
we can provision on-demand test
environments for our agile teams which
are developing
internet bank and smart bank solutions
we are able to provision
our environments in matter of hours
that's something what used to take us
actually
days or weeks before and we were having
troubles with the quality
we are also using the benefits of
security
because for example network segmentation
which is quite difficult to achieve
on premise is very simple for us in aws
environment
we have selected aws because it's strong
its significant presence in central
european region
who is investing significant resources
in for the development of its platform
fiat moneta have led the way of cloud
adoption in financial services in czech
republic
and thanks to the cooperation with aws
we have been able to convince the
regulator
that it needs all the necessary
requirements
and i have to say that aws offers most
of it out of the box
